name: Crush Your Debts! (Jam)
description:
Made using GameMaker: Studio for the Manchester Student Jam. The theme was "Crushing student debt".

  • WASD / arrow keys - move
  • S / DOWN  - in mid-air to crush
  • SPACE - to use exit (yellow square)
  • BACKSPACE - to restart level

Crush all "debts" (red squares) before proceeding through the exit (yellow square)

Tip: Be selective in the order you take the enemies out.
